Chapter Previous Next

class gstPolyPropertyContainer

Container class to hold indexed property information of 1,2, and/or 3 dimensional quality pertaining to an entire polygon or to it's individual vertices.

From header file: gstPolyPropertyContainer.h

Constructors and Destructors
~gstPolyPropertyContainer
Functions
evalDoubleProperty Evaluates the value of the gstPolyProperty with Id() equal to polyPropertyId at the barycentric coordinate barycentricCoord and stores the value in 'val'.
evalPoint2DProperty Evaluates the value of the gstPolyProperty with Id() equal to polyPropertyId at the barycentric coordinate barycentricCoord and stores the value in 'val'.
evalPoint3DProperty Evaluates the value of the gstPolyProperty with Id() equal to polyPropertyId at the barycentric coordinate barycentricCoord and stores the value in 'val'.
getPropertyPoly Returns a pointer to the property associated with the entire poly with Id equal to polyPropertyId.
getPropertyV1 Returns a pointer to the property associated with vertex v1 with Id equal to polyPropertyId.
getPropertyV2 Returns a pointer to the property associated with vertex v2 with Id equal to polyPropertyId.
getPropertyV3 Returns a pointer to the property associated with vertex v3 with Id equal to polyPropertyId.
removePropertyPoly Removes the property associated with the entire poly with Id equal to polyPropertyId and returns TRUE.
removePropertyVerts Removes the property associated with vertices with Id equal to polyPropertyId and returns TRUE.
setPropertyPoly Stores the property prop and associates it with the entire poly and returns TRUE.
setPropertyV1 Stores the property prop and associates it with vertex v1 of poly and returns TRUE.
setPropertyV2 Stores the property prop and associates it with vertex v2 of poly and returns TRUE.
setPropertyV3 Stores the property prop and associates it with vertex v3 of poly and returns TRUE.
getVertPropertyStruct Returns structure for vertex properties of Id = polyPropertyId.
Virtual Functions
